full_output.summary: Dynamic intern adept in IT and social media marketing. Seamlessly integrating technical expertise with creative acumen to elevate brand visibility and engagement across digital platforms

projects.name: Data Analytics Consulting Virtual Project
projects.description: Worked on Data Quality Assessment of the given dataset containing data on 4000+ customers. Gathered Data Insights and listed out the top 1000 high-value customers using the Recency, Frequency, Monetary Value (RFM) method. Further used Data Visualization tools Tableau to gain further insights on the high-value customers.

experiences.description: Successfully generated leads and boosted sales in a B2C environment Quickly advanced to Team Buddy position due to exceptional performance

Built a product specifications model using MS-EXCEL. On-boarded over 50+ distributors on the company's platform. Involved in building a pricing model of the products available. Involved in devising strategies to identify and acquire the supply side.

Led the development of the YIF website while also showcasing strong skills in graphic design, ensuring a visually appealing and user-friendly online presence for the organization. Promoted to IT Head for exceptional performance. Oversaw and mentored a team of 200+ interns, ensuring productivity and success Worked closely with various departments to execute strategic social media marketing campaigns.
